scripts.db_update: pip2 install -r db/requirements.txt; python db/update.py; python db/update-db-stamp.py;
scripts.test_generate_map_data: cd newFeatures; python TESTcreateJsonData.py; cd ../public/data_sets/TEST_map_data_named; python zipReg.py; cd ../../..
scripts.generate_map_data: cd newFeatures; python createJsonData.py; cd ../public/data_sets/map_data_named; python zipReg.py; cd ../../..
scripts.test_generate_kml_data: cd newFeatures; python TESTcreateKmlData.py; cd ../public/data_sets/TEST_kml_map_data; cd ../../..
scripts.generate_kml_data: cd newFeatures; python createKmlData.py; cd ../public/data_sets/kml_map_data; cd ../../..
